title: Data Storage Conversions – Convert Bits, Bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB, PB

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Bit vs byte 1 byte (B) = 8 bits (b) A bit can be either 0 or 1; a byte is typically the smallest addressable unit of memory in modern computers.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: General conversion logic Let v be the original value, kfrom the byte factor of the source unit, and kto the byte factor of the target unit. bytes = v × k_from result = bytes ÷ k_to
